title: Vegancja
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: As of April 2016, the only vegetarian restaurant in the city. Uses high quality ingredients including green veggies, fruits, whole grains, legumes, nuts, seeds and seaweed. Offers new dishes weekly. Most dishes are gluten free. Vegan items include soups, vegan letcho or dwarf beans in Brittany style and vegan sweets such as carrot/banana and chocolate/orange pies, cheesecakes or poppy tortes. Your pets will be hosted as well.
